bioconda.name: genesplicer
bioconda.summary: GeneSplicer : A computational method for splice site prediction

biocontainers.name: genesplicer
biocontainers.summary: Genesplicer : a computational method for splice site prediction

biotools.summary: A fast, flexible system for detecting splice sites in the genomic DNA of various eukaryotes. The system has been trained and tested successfully on Plasmodium falciparum (malaria), Arabidopsis thaliana, human, Drosophila, and rice.

bioschemas.name: GeneSplicer
bioschemas.summary: A fast, flexible system for detecting splice sites in the genomic DNA of various eukaryotes. The system has been trained and tested successfully on Plasmodium falciparum (malaria), Arabidopsis thaliana, human, Drosophila, and rice.
